Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more!
Catering Packages × 
We are taking online reservations!

Let’s ensure you get a great table: Book today!

We recommend making a reservation ahead of time. Book your table today!
Book Table × 
Order your favorite dishes in seconds!
Order Online 
Our traditional Mexican flavors, made from scratch to your plate! From savory tacos to sizzling Fajitas our menu showcases a delightful array of classic and contemporary Mexican delights. Complementing our delectable fare is a selection of  handcraft Margaritas and cocktails that perfectly complement the flavors of our cuisine. Our dedicated team is committed to providing exceptional services, we look forward to welcoming you to our restaurant. The home of the most delicious Mexican Food in Charleston, and proud keeper of the best Mexican recipes, right in Ashley Crossing.
Our menu catering 
Let us cater your next event

When it comes to your next event, let us take care of the food with our delicious and expertly crafted catering options featuring a wide range of dishes that are sure to please any palate.
catering Order Online 
Pick Up Your Favorite Food

Our restaurant now offers the convenience of online ordering for our customers. This allows for easy pick-up or delivery options, making it simple to enjoy your favorite dishes from the comfort of your own home.
Order

Reviews

Review by - Google

Ebony N:

Great little eatery! Every time I come here the service is impeccable! The food is delicious.

Review by - Google

Joanna C:

Sat outside. Great food, good flavors and fresh produce. I haven't gone anywhere else for Spanish dishes. Fresh chips made daily with a spicey red salsa sauce complementary. They have the best sweet tea and unsweetened tea. I get mine mixed 1/2 & 1/2.

Review by - Google

Najla W:

Celebrated my birthday here on 10/14 with roughly 20 people. We were able to decorate and we had the time of your LIVESSS!! The staff was amazing and the food was great!
We all enjoyed ourselves and we will definitely continuing coming back here

Review by - Google

Iarry S:

The food is amazing I have never had a bad meal there. The carnitas, shrimp tacos to the chips and salsa you can't go wrong... All if it is delicious and the staff are amazing and friendly.

Review by - Google

Joseph R:

The staff were super nice and very dog friendly on their outdoor tables!
